mapper.select: select n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_career, n.com_email, c.com_name, datediff(n.notice_endDate, now()) from notice_tb n join com_tb c where datediff(n.notice_endDate, now())>=0 and n.com_email = c.com_email and n.notice_career='신입' order by notice_num desc limit 4

select n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_career, n.notice_hit, n.com_email, c.com_name, datediff(n.notice_endDate, now()) as noticeDday from notice_tb n join com_tb c where datediff(n.notice_endDate, now())>=0 and n.com_email = c.com_email and n.notice_career='신입' order by notice_hit desc, notice_num desc limit 5

select n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_career, n.notice_hit, n.com_email, c.com_name, datediff(n.notice_endDate, now()) as noticeDday from notice_tb n join com_tb c where datediff(n.notice_endDate, now())>=0 and n.com_email = c.com_email and n.notice_career!='신입' order by notice_hit desc, notice_num desc limit 5

select n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_career, n.notice_hit, n.com_email, c.com_name, datediff(n.notice_endDate, now()) as noticeDday from notice_tb n join com_tb c where datediff(n.notice_endDate, now())>=0 and n.com_email = c.com_email order by notice_hit desc, notice_num desc limit 5
select uuid, uploadPath, fileName, image, notice_num from notice_attach where notice_num=#{notice_num}
select uuid, uploadPath, fileName, image, com_email from com_attach where com_email=#{com_email}
